Computer.name: Unisoft Work PC 3
Computer.file:
# Decypher
### What is Decypher? Decypher is a tool included in the DEC Solutions encryption suite. It decrypts files that have been encrypted with their Encripter tool.
### Where is Encripter and the other tools in the DEC Solutions encryption suite? All the other tools are closed-source - you cannot view the source code and edit it. We have decompiled Decypher first and made it open-source for everyone to contribute to. The other tools in the encryption suite will be made open-source in due time, just give us a few weeks!
### Other information This project is licensed under the MIT License, which can be found at the LICENSE file or [here](https://opensource.org/licenses/mit)
